name: wave-incense
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Water moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Mantine begets a Mantyke Egg.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
